entries.source: Chat Edit: 'I am trying to create a simple volume widget to go on my quickshell bar, can you assist?'

Chat Edit: 'Failed to load configuration
  caused by @shell.qml[21:42]: Type Bar unavailable
  caused by @modules/bar/Bar.qml[50:53]: Type Volume unavailable
  caused by @modules/bar/Volume.qml[37:13]: Cannot assign to non-existent property "color"'
Chat Edit: 'I am just getting an NaN% displayed on my bar'
Chat Edit: 'now it says 0% instead of NaN, but of course my volume is not 0%'

Chat Edit: 'that worked, the indicator is not well positioned, and I would like to have a volume icon there so I can see visually that the percentage refers to volume, for positioning, you can use Power.qml or Time.qml for reference'

Chat Edit: 'you can use nerd font icon for the volume picture. if you don't know how to access that, put in a placeholder and I will get the correct nerd font icon. Also I want to be able to position my mouse over the widget and scroll using the scroll wheel to change volume. clicking should mute/unmute.'
Chat Edit: 'there were no errors, but the mouse wheel and clicking functionality does not work'
Chat Edit: 'still nothing at all happens'
Chat Edit: 'it works! thanks a lot! maybe you could change the nerd font icon to î¬¤ (mute nerd font icon) if the volume is muted'
